page.title: 02Employment in Greenhill
page.content: Greenhill is a small hamlet on high ground to the south west of Ringsbury Camp. It is situated off the B4041 between Purton and Wootton Bassett.The community is small, the majority of people having lived there all their lives. Over the years new faces and buildings have arrived in the area. Until recently almost all the employment revolved around the 3 farms whose land accounts for about 70% of the acreage in Greenhill. At the present time, in addition to the dairy farming there are other employments in Greenhill. They are all associated with the land. There is a firm of landscape gardeners providing turfing and fencing. Also there is a small nursery dealing in a wide variety of trees, shrubs etc. Half an acre is used for vegetables.
